00015 
00016 #ifndef BOOST_TIMER_HPP
00017 #define BOOST_TIMER_HPP
00018 
00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #include <ctime>
00021 #include <boost/limits.hpp>
00022 
00023 # ifdef BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE
00024     namespace std { using ::clock_t; using ::clock; }
00025 # endif
00026 
00027 
00028 namespace boost {
00029 
00030 //  timer  -------------------------------------------------------------------//
00031 
00032 //  A timer object measures elapsed time.
00033 
00034 //  It is recommended that implementations measure wall clock rather than CPU
00035 //  time since the intended use is performance measurement on systems where
00036 //  total elapsed time is more important than just process or CPU time.
00037 
00038 //  Warnings: The maximum measurable elapsed time may well be only 596.5+ hours
00039 //  due to implementation limitations.  The accuracy of timings depends on the
00040 //  accuracy of timing information provided by the underlying platform, and
00041 //  this varies a great deal from platform to platform.
00042 
00043 class timer
00044 {
00045  public:
00046          timer() { _start_time = std::clock(); } // postcondition: elapsed()==0
00047 //         timer( const timer& src );      // post: elapsed()==src.elapsed()
00048 //        ~timer(){}
00049 //  timer& operator=( const timer& src );  // post: elapsed()==src.elapsed()
00050   void   restart() { _start_time = std::clock(); } // post: elapsed()==0
00051   double elapsed() const                  // return elapsed time in seconds
00052     { return  double(std::clock() - _start_time) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC; }
00053 
00054   double elapsed_max() const   // return estimated maximum value for elapsed()
00055   // Portability warning: elapsed_max() may return too high a value on systems
00056   // where std::clock_t overflows or resets at surprising values.
00057   {
00058     return (double(std::numeric_limits<std::clock_t>::max())
00059        - double(_start_time)) / double(CLOCKS_PER_SEC); 
00060   }
00061 
00062   double elapsed_min() const            // return minimum value for elapsed()
00063    { return double(1)/double(CLOCKS_PER_SEC); }
00064 
00065  private:
00066   std::clock_t _start_time;
00067 }; // timer
00068 
00069 } // namespace boost
00070 
00071 #endif  // BOOST_TIMER_HPP
